mapper.insert: INSERT INTO airport (ai_name, ai_na_name, ai_standard_time) VALUES (#{aiName}, #{aiNaName}, #{aiStandardTime});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM airport WHERE ai_name = #{aiName} AND ai_na_name = #{aiNaName}

select ai_name, ai_num, ai_na_name from airport join route on if(#{route}, ro_ai_start,ro_ai_end) = ai_num join nation on ai_na_name = na_name join division on na_di_name = di_name where ro_ai_start= if(#{route}, airport.ai_num, #{ai_num}) group by if(#{route}, ro_ai_start, ro_ai_end) order by di_name asc, na_name asc, ai_name asc;
